instagram.title: Connect Instagram Direct
instagram.limitationText: By default, Instagram only provides the numeric ID of users who message you. If you want to see the usernames (@username) of your leads, you will need to:
instagram.step2: Then, also activate the Facebook integration (shown below)
instagram.step3: During the Facebook process, log in and authorize the requested permissions
instagram.noteText: This is a Meta/Facebook limitation. The Facebook integration allows you to obtain a "Page Access Token" that gives access to additional user profile information.

facebook.title: Connect Facebook (Page Access Token)
facebook.intro: This integration allows you to obtain a Page Access Token from Facebook to access additional information about your Instagram contacts (such as usernames and profile pictures).
facebook.requirement1: A Facebook account linked to your Instagram Business page
facebook.requirement2: Administrator permissions on the Facebook page
facebook.requirement3: The Instagram account must be a Business or Creator account
facebook.resource1: How to convert your Instagram account to Business
facebook.resource2: Connect Instagram to a Facebook Page
facebook.importantText: During the authorization process, make sure to select the Facebook page that is connected to your Instagram Business account.

whatsapp.title: Connect WhatsApp Business
whatsapp.intro: To connect WhatsApp Business you need to authorize permissions on Facebook/Meta.
whatsapp.requirement1: WhatsApp Business API account (not the regular WhatsApp Business app)
whatsapp.requirement2: Verified phone number on WhatsApp Business
whatsapp.noteText: You will be redirected to Facebook to authorize the necessary permissions.

googleCalendar.title: Connect Google Calendar
googleCalendar.intro: This integration allows you to sync and manage your Google Calendar events and meetings directly from Appsetter.
googleCalendar.benefit1: View all your events and meetings in one place
googleCalendar.benefit2: Automatic synchronization with your Google account
googleCalendar.benefit3: Access to detailed event information, attendees, and locations
googleCalendar.noteText: During the authorization process, make sure to grant the necessary permissions to access your calendar. These permissions are required for us to display and manage your events.
